description: Ms. codex. Title from title page (fol. 1a). 17 lines per page. Written in medium large naskh in black ink with use of red. Soft glazed light cream paper with laid and chain lines visible. Fol. 22 is a later replacement on European paper with watermark. Marginal annotations. Catchword on the verso of each leaf. Inscription in Arabic script on a label pasted on the upper cover: "Dimashq 9". Copy completed on Tuesday 12 Rajab 847 [Nov. 5, 1443] by ʻAbd Allāh ibn Ismāʻīl al-Khaṭīb al-Ḥanbalī al-ʻIrāqī (colophon, fol. 257b). Ijāzah for the copyist (whose name is given in full as al-shaykh al-fāḍil Jamāl al-Dīn Abū Muḥammad ʻAbd Allāh al-Ajmī(?) thumma al-Baghdādī, nazīl Ḥalab al-Ḥanbalī), from Aḥmad ibn Ibrāhīm ... al-Shāfiʻī Sibṭ ibn al-ʻAjamī, dated 7 Muḥarram 848 (fol. 258a). Incipit: باب الشروط في البيع حدثنا عبد الله بن مسلمة Explicit:[255أ] باب المعراج ... [257ب] قال هي رؤيا عين اريها رسول الهه ... ليلة اشري به الي بيت المقدس قال والشجرة الملعونة في القران هي شجرة الزقوم كمل الجزء الخامس عشر من صحيح الامام ابي عبد الله البخاري
author: Bukhārī, Muḥammad ibn Ismāʻīl, 810-870
abstract: Parts 11-15 of thirty of the Ṣaḥīḥ al-Bukhārī, comprising the end of Kitāb al-shurūṭ to Kitāb faḍāʼil aṣḥāb al-nabī. Princeton Library, Islamic mss. Garrett no. 407Y and 409Y are part of the same set.

title.@value: الجزء الحادي عشر من صحيح الامام ابي عبد الله محمد بن اسماعيل البخاري ... تجزية ثلاثين جزاءً
al-Juzʼ al-ḥādī ʻashar min Ṣaḥīḥ al-Imām Abī ʻAbd Allāh Muḥammad ibn Ismāʻīl al-Bukhārī ... tajziyat thalāthīn juzʼan.

dlme_title_ara_arab: الجزء الحادي عشر من صحيح الامام ابي عبد الله محمد بن اسماعيل البخاري ... تجزية ثلاثين جزاءً
dlme_title_ara_latn: al-Juzʼ al-ḥādī ʻashar min Ṣaḥīḥ al-Imām Abī ʻAbd Allāh Muḥammad ibn Ismāʻīl al-Bukhārī ... tajziyat thalāthīn juzʼan.
provenance: Ownership statement in the name of al-Ḥājj Muḥammad al-Marʻī(?) ... (fol. 258a). Acquired from Abraham Shalom Yahuda, 1942.
dlme_provenance_en: Ownership statement in the name of al-Ḥājj Muḥammad al-Marʻī(?) ... (fol. 258a). Acquired from Abraham Shalom Yahuda, 1942.
creator: Bukhārī, Muḥammad ibn Ismāʻīl, 810-870
بخاري، محمد بن اسماعيل
subject: Hadith—Texts—Early works to 1800
binding_note: Brown leather over paper pasteboards for upper and lower covers. Worn out central blind stamped mandorla with outer frame consisting of fillets. Re-used paper pastedowns. Traces of a leather doublure on fol. 258b. Damaged. Rebacked.
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
